mapper.select: SELECT (t.usable_money+t.frozen_money) AS totalMoney, t.usable_money AS usableMoney, t.frozen_money AS frozenMoney, security_code AS securityCode FROM shop_account t WHERE t.sys_user_id = #{sysUserId}
SELECT * FROM shop_account t WHERE t.sys_user_id = (SELECT mu.sys_user_id FROM merchant_user mu WHERE mu.merchant_code = #{merchantCode})
SELECT * FROM shop_account t WHERE t.sys_user_id = #{sysUserId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_account ( sys_user_id, total_money, usable_money, frozen_money, recharge_money, status, security_code ) VALUES ( #{sysUserId}, #{totalMoney}, #{usableMoney}, #{frozenMoney}, #{rechargeMoney}, #{status}, #{securityCode} );
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_account SET security_code = #{securityCode} WHERE sys_user_id = #{sysUserId}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT merchant_name FROM merchant_user WHERE sys_user_id=tt.sys_user_id) AS merchantName, tt.total_money AS totalMoney, tt.usable_money AS usableMoney, tt.frozen_money AS frozenMoney FROM shop_account tt ORDER BY tt.usable_money DESC
